Title: The decreasing popularity of HDD
Author: Nguyen Duy Quang
Text: Hdd is losing its place as the go to hardware storage medium in the face of the advancing SSD disk

Comments.Text: i personally still prefer the HDD, so much more cost efficient

Title: China's Real estate bubble close to explosion
Author: Lee Enfield
Text: After decades of speculation, and over leveraging the real estate bubble in china is popping with the fall of Evergrande

Comments.Text: We all knew this was comming
